name: CATEGORIES.SMARTPHONES.NAME
description: Some gems have hidden qualities beyond their luster, beyond their shine... is one of those gems.

questions.question: Which one of the below features are the most important for you?

choices.detail: A good camera, I love taking pictures!
Good speakers, I listen to music all the time!
A good screen resolution, I love playing games and watching videos on the phone!
A large screen, I like to read on my phone

questions.question: How much you would like to spend?
Is there any functionality you cannot live without?

choices.detail: It is used to connect with other devices. Most used for sharing files (like pictures, videos, music, etc..) or to control other devices like headphones, speakers, etc...
Mostly used by people who are customers of more than one phone provider.
Particularly useful for people who are constantly by the water. Be it for work or leisure.

name: CATEGORIES.LAPTOPS.NAME
description: Some gems have hidden qualities beyond their luster, beyond their shine... Azurite is one of those gems.

questions.question: Which one of the below features are the most important for you?

choices.detail: Good memory, I use the laptop with applications that demand a lot of memory usage!
Good processing power, I use the laptop with applications like image renderer, video editors, etc...!
Plenty of disk space, I store a lot of files like videos, images, music on my laptop... I need space!
A good graphic board, I want to be able to play games on my new laptop!

name: CATEGORIES.TELEVISIONS.NAME
description: Some gems have hidden qualities beyond their luster, beyond their shine... Azurite is one of those gems.

questions.question: Which one of the below features are the most important for you?

choices.detail: A large screen, I have a big living room and I want to have my own cinema at home!
Good resolution, I want to see the minimal details of the movies I watch!
A great surround system, I want to feel like the sound of the movies are coming from all directions!
